contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 12, 1978 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Third Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Third Section) 30 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-third-section
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including the march 'BB&CF'. 6 bands competed.
1st Prize: £25.00 (Copperad trophy) 2nd Prize: £15.00 3rd Prize: £10.00
Result announced on the day as 1 Hyde 2 Epping Forest 3 Wigston British Bandsman 18/2/1978 states that the result was announced incorrectly and was in fact 1 Brackley 2 London Co-op 3 Epping Forest British Bandsman 25/2/1978 then printed a further correction, giving, as above 1 Brackley 2 Epping Forest 3 Wigston
March 7, 2011, 1:05 p.m. Sept. 9, 2013, 11:59 a.m.
1 Brackley and District Band Les Taylor
2 Epping Forest Band J. Anderson
3 Wigston Band Garry Sleath
Unknown Result London Co-op Forest Stephen Atkins
Unknown Result Hyde Band D. Tanner
